languages.text: "Лучше, чем в прошлую нашу встречу, шерин, да благословит Великий ваш путь! Впрочем, на Футфоле мне день ото дня становится все неуютнее — без благоволения Наместника эта забытая {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Троном{/g} станция весьма опасна. Быть может, переберусь куда-нибудь подальше, как только прикину, как избавиться от лишних обязательств и сбыть связывающие меня товары..."

traits.locale_text: "Лучше, чем в прошлую нашу встречу, шерин, да благословит Великий ваш путь! Впрочем, на Футфоле мне день ото дня становится все неуютнее — без благоволения Наместника эта забытая Троном станция весьма опасна. Быть может, переберусь куда-нибудь подальше, как только прикину, как избавиться от лишних обязательств и сбыть связывающие меня товары..."

languages.text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."
languages.original_text: "Лучше, чем в прошлую нашу встречу, шерин, да благословит Великий ваш путь! Впрочем, на Футфоле мне день ото дня становится все неуютнее — без благоволения Наместника эта забытая {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Троном{/g} станция весьма опасна. Быть может, переберусь куда-нибудь подальше, как только прикину, как избавиться от лишних обязательств и сбыть связывающие меня товары..."

traits.locale_text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favor, this Throne-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place. Perhaps I will move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and pawn off some inconvenient goods..."

"Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."

languages.text: 「前回、会った時よりだいぶましだよ、シャリーン。エグザルテッド・ワンのご加護がアンタにありますように！けど、フットフォールでの生活は日に日に厳しくなってる…領主の寵愛がなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}に見放されたこのステーションはかなり危険な場所。不要な負債を排除して都合の悪い荷物をどこかに降ろす方法を見つけ次第、どこか遠くへ引っ越そうかと…」
languages.original_text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."

traits.locale_text: 「前回、会った時よりだいぶましだよ、シャリーン。エグザルテッド・ワンのご加護がアンタにありますように！けど、フットフォールでの生活は日に日に厳しくなってる…領主の寵愛がなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}に見放されたこのステーションはかなり危険な場所。不要な負債を排除して都合の悪い荷物をどこかに降ろす方法を見つけ次第、どこか遠くへ引っ越そうかと…」

languages.text: “比咱们上次见面的时候好多了，亲爱的！愿至高无上的神皇指引你的前路！不过，我在落脚港的日子一天比一天难过。没有总督的庇护，这个被{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}遗忘的地方实在太危险了。等我想好该如何摆脱某些讨厌的负债，清理掉某些棘手的货物之后，或许真该远走高飞了……”
languages.original_text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."

traits.locale_text: “比咱们上次见面的时候好多了，亲爱的！愿至高无上的神皇指引你的前路！不过，我在落脚港的日子一天比一天难过。没有总督的庇护，这个被{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}遗忘的地方实在太危险了。等我想好该如何摆脱某些讨厌的负债，清理掉某些棘手的货物之后，或许真该远走高飞了……”

languages.text: « Mieux que lors de notre dernière rencontre, shereen. Puisse l'Exalté bénir votre route ! Mais ma situation sur Castel devient de plus en plus inconfortable. Sans le soutien du suzerain, cette station oubliée par le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} peut se révéler fort dangereuse. J'irai peut-être m'installer très loin d'ici... dès que j'aurai trouvé un moyen de me débarrasser d'un certain passif et de marchandises quelque peu gênantes... »
languages.original_text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."

traits.locale_text: « Mieux que lors de notre dernière rencontre, shereen. Puisse l'Exalté bénir votre route ! Mais ma situation sur Castel devient de plus en plus inconfortable. Sans le soutien du suzerain, cette station oubliée par le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} peut se révéler fort dangereuse. J'irai peut-être m'installer très loin d'ici... dès que j'aurai trouvé un moyen de me débarrasser d'un certain passif et de marchandises quelque peu gênantes... »

languages.text: «Mejor que la última vez que nos vimos, shereen. ¡Que el Exaltado bendiga su camino! Sin embargo, Paso se me hace más cuesta arriba cada día que pasa; sin el favor del Señor, cada vez es más peligroso vivir en esta estación alejada de la mano del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}. A lo mejor me mudo a un sitio lejos de aquí, en cuanto averigüe cómo deshacerme de un par de lastres indeseados y mercancía que me estorba».
languages.original_text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."

traits.locale_text: «Mejor que la última vez que nos vimos, shereen. ¡Que el Exaltado bendiga su camino! Sin embargo, Paso se me hace más cuesta arriba cada día que pasa; sin el favor del Señor, cada vez es más peligroso vivir en esta estación alejada de la mano del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}. A lo mejor me mudo a un sitio lejos de aquí, en cuanto averigüe cómo deshacerme de un par de lastres indeseados y mercancía que me estorba».

languages.text: "Besser als bei unserem letzten Treffen, Shereen, möge der Erhabene Euren Weg segnen! Allerdings wird Footfall für mich von Tag zu Tag ungemütlicher ... ohne die Gunst des Lehnsherrn ist diese {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}thronvergessene{/g} Station ein ziemlich gefährliches Pflaster. Vielleicht fliege ich weit weg von hier, sobald ich einige lästige Verpflichtungen hinter mir gelassen und eine ungewöhnliche Fracht abgeladen habe ..."
languages.original_text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."

traits.locale_text: "Besser als bei unserem letzten Treffen, Shereen, möge der Erhabene Euren Weg segnen! Allerdings wird Footfall für mich von Tag zu Tag ungemütlicher ... ohne die Gunst des Lehnsherrn ist diese {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}thron{/g}vergessene Station ein ziemlich gefährliches Pflaster. Vielleicht fliege ich weit weg von hier, sobald ich einige lästige Verpflichtungen hinter mir gelassen und eine ungewöhnliche Fracht abgeladen habe ..."

languages.original_text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this Throne-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."

languages.text: "Son görüşmemizden bu yana çok daha iyiyim şirinim, Görkemli yolunu açık etsin! Gerçi Binliman'da günlerim, gitgide daha zor geçmeye başladı. Emîr kayırmayınca, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht'ın{/g} unuttuğu bu istasyon epey tehlikeli bir yere dönüşüyor. Bazı istenmedik yükümlülüklerimden kurtulup birkaç uygunsuz malı satabilirsem belki çok uzaklara taşınabilirim."
languages.original_text: "Better than the last time we met, shereen, may the Exalted One bless your path! However, it gets less and less comfortable for me on Footfall by the day — without the Liege's favour, this {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}-forgotten station is a rather dangerous place to be. Maybe I'll move somewhere far away, as soon as I figure out how to rid myself of some unwanted liabilities and offload some inconvenient goods..."

traits.locale_text: "En son görüştüğümüzden bu yana çok daha iyiyim şirinim, Görkemli yolunu açık etsin! Gerçi Binliman'da geçen her gün, benim için daha da rahatsız edici bir hâl almaya başladı... Emîr'in kayırması olmaksızın, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g}'ın unuttuğu bu istasyon epey tehlikeli bir yer oldu. Bazı istenmedik sorumluluklarımdan kurtulup bazı külfetli malları satabilirsem, çok uzaklara taşınırım belki..."
